review: Our family of 4 LOVE this.  So easy to set up.  With yet another $110 a month cable bill (and our family watches a total of about ten stations), we decided we had had enough.  Bit the proverbial bullet and am on buying another two of these tonight for the bedroom and second living room.  NO commercials is wonderful, and we had been recording everything just to skip the commercials anyhow.  Main thing is we are not paying for cable anymore - I am happy to pay an early cancellation fee that will more than pay for itself in three months.  I for one am tired of paying to watch television, we bought a Netflix subscription and LOVE it!!!
